definition: not to get involved/to stay out of it
to install/to place/to put/to buy
body/life/oneself/personally/one's morality and conduct/the main part of a structure or body/pregnant/classifier for sets of clothes: suit, twinset/Kangxi radical 158
matter/thing/item/work/affair/CL:件[jian4],樁|桩[zhuang1],回[hui2]
outside/in addition/foreign/external

sentences.english: The US "will never distance itself from Israel".
sentences.chinese: 美國“將永遠不會在以色列的問題上置身事外”。

sentences.english: And in that case you should butt out.
sentences.chinese: 如果是那樣的話，你應該置身事外。

sentences.english: You could think of it cool if you can stand back.
sentences.chinese: 如果你能置身事外，你就能冷靜地思考這件事。

sentences.english: I no longer have to do without now, all colors are translated into soumds and smells. and they ring infinitely sweet like tones.
sentences.chinese: 現在我已不再置身事外，所有色採皆已入聲音與氣息。

sentences.english: Yet the boy won’t be sidelined so easily.
sentences.chinese: 然而這個小男孩並沒有輕易地置身事外。

sentences.english: Why should the minimum payment be decided exogenously by the government?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼最低的工資要讓置身事外的政府來決定？

sentences.english: When the Trade Federation invaded Naboo, Boss Nass chose to remain uninvolved in the conflict.
sentences.chinese: 當貿易聯盟入侵納布時，納斯頭領決定置身事外。

definition: to watch with folded arms (idiom); to look on without lifting a finger
a matter of no concern to oneself (idiom)
the cool eye of a bystander/a detached point of view
to get involved in/to meddle/interference
to watch the fires burning across the river/to delay entering the fray until all others have been exhausted by fighting amongst themselves (idiom)
sit on the mountain and watch the tigers fight/watch in safety whilst others fight then reap the rewards when both sides are exhausted (idiom)
a wise man looks after his own hide (idiom)/to put one's own safety before matters of principle
to play deaf-mute
to stand aside and do nothing (idiom)/to take no part in
to sit and watch, but remain indifferent (idiom)
spectator/non-participant
powerless to defend oneself (idiom); helpless
variant of 趟渾水|趟浑水[tang1 hun2 shui3]
to feel unconcerned and let matters rest (idiom)
pinyin: shi4 bu4 guan1 ji3 , gao1 gao1 gua4 qi3

definition: to avoid a problem by walking away from it/to quit
see 撕破臉|撕破脸[si1 po4 lian3]
